=== QDark ===

An elegant name for an elegant theme, a dark glossy theme for Ubuntu. Also call QDark Studio
=== Concept ===

It's a perfect theme for the new version of Ubuntu, a lot of people loves dark themes and QDark is a good alternative, it's simple and elegant, easy to use and perfect for Ubuntu Studio.
